price: ߌ ߦߴߌ ߡߎ߬ߢߎ߲߬ ߠߊ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߘߌ߬ ߌ ߟߊ߫ ߟߐ߲ߠߌ߲ ߡߊ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߠߊߝߏ߬؟
arabic: وَكَيۡفَ تَصۡبِرُ عَلَىٰ مَا لَمۡ تُحِطۡ بِهِۦ خُبۡرٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wakayfa taṣbiru ʿalā mā lam tuḥiṭ bihi khub'ran
